0871A46B.Toast: Recover Backwater's stolen property from the bandits

1EADAE68.Callback2Header: Find the stolen supplies with Orton

38AA8D97.Callback10Header: Bring the supplies back to Lyndon

5CD6EA0D.Phase8Description: Orton doesn't believe the claims but left me to recover the supplies and return them on my own.

61CFD437.Phase11Description: I have recovered the stolen supplies and should return to Lyndon in Backwater.

803B8057.Phase20Description: We killed the ones that took the supplies, but one of them claimed Lyndon cheated them. I should speak to Orton about it.

D53BFF05.Phase0Description: Bandits recently broke into Backwater's shared stockpiles and stole some supplies. Lyndon, Backwater's leader, has sent me off with his right-hand man to find the bandits and recover the goods.
